name: Roasted Root Vegetables
keywords: fresh herbs, olive oil, root vegetables, side dish, vegan, vegetarian, winter
recipeIngredient:
3 pounds assorted root vegetables:
carrots, parsnips, celeriac, potatoes,
turnips, etc.

Chopped rosemary, thyme or
parsley, plus more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text:
Heat oven to 425 degrees. Peel
vegetables (optional) and cut them
into 1- to 2-inch chunks, put them in
a baking pan and toss with the oil
and a sprinkling of salt and pepper.

Put the vegetables in the oven
and roast without stirring for 20
minutes, then check. If they look dry
and are sticking to the pan, drizzle
with more oil. Continue roasting,
stirring or turning the vegetables
once, for another 20 minutes or so.
Stir in the herbs, then return the pan
to the oven for another 20 to 40
minutes, until crisp. Remove from the
oven. Garnish with rosemary or thyme.
